info.title: Auto-generated OAS of Cassandra using OOPS

200.description: Service is ready to handle requests

500.description: Service is not ready to handle requests

parameters.description: The consistency level to check for the cluster
parameters.name: consistency_level

parameters.description: Replication factor per datacenter
parameters.name: rf_per_dc

200.description: Cassandra is able to achieve the specified consistency

500.description: Cassandra is unable to achieve the specified consistency

200.description: List of new seeds after reload

parameters.description: The ID of the job to retrieve status for
parameters.name: job_id

parameters.description: Whether to force the decommission operation
parameters.name: force

500.description: Internal server error during decommission operation

parameters.description: The MB/s throughput cap for compaction in the system, or 0 to disable throttling
parameters.name: value

parameters.description: The address of the node to assassinate
parameters.name: address

400.description: Cassandra node assasination request missing address

parameters.description: The target component or class for which to set the log level
parameters.name: target

parameters.description: The log level threshold to set
parameters.name: rawLevel

500.description: Internal server error during drain operation

parameters.description: The host for which to truncate hints. If not provided, all hints on the local node will be truncated.
parameters.name: host

requestBody.description: Request body for taking a snapshot

text/plain.example: When specifying keyspace_tables, specifying keyspaces is not allowed

parameters.description: List of snapshot names to clear
parameters.name: snapshotNames

parameters.description: List of keyspaces to clear snapshots from
parameters.name: keyspaces

parameters.description: Whether to enable (true) or disable (false) full query logging
parameters.name: enabled

500.description: Internal Server Error (e.g. "Internal connection to Cassandra closed" or other exception message)

202.description: Job ID for successfully scheduled Cassandra node move request

parameters.description: The username for the new role
parameters.name: username

parameters.description: Whether the role has superuser privileges
parameters.name: is_superuser

parameters.description: Whether the role can login
parameters.name: can_login

parameters.description: The password for the new role
parameters.name: password

406.description: Not Acceptable - Cassandra is running or invalid JSON

500.description: Internal Server Error - Error during configuration processing

202.description: Cassandra already running and can connect

204.description: Cassandra already running but can't connect

206.description: Cassandra process not found but can connect

parameters.description: Whether to exclude current version SSTables from the upgrade
parameters.name: excludeCurrentVersion

requestBody.description: Request body containing keyspace and table information

500.description: Internal server error due to connection issues or other exceptions

parameters.description: The tombstone option, must be either ROW or CELL
parameters.name: tombstoneOption

text/plain.example: tombstoneOption must be either ROW or CELL

requestBody.description: Request object containing keyspace and table information for flush operation

500.description: Internal server error during table flush operation

text/plain.example: List tables failed. Non-empty 'keyspaceName' must be provided

requestBody.description: Request body for creating a new table
Keyspace cleanup request containing jobs, keyspace name, and tables

400.description: Keyspace name or Table name not provided

parameters.name: keyspaceName

500.description: Internal server error when decommission operation fails

200.description: Gets the schema versions for each node. Useful for checking schema agreement

snapshot_name.description: Name of the snapshot to create

table_name.description: Name of a specific table to snapshot

jobs.description: Number of jobs for scrub operation

order.description: The clustering order for clustering columns
